about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Committed to Sustainable Rural Development
about.historyText: Aadarsh Navjyoti Vikas Sansthan was established in 2014 with a vision to create sustainable development opportunities in rural Rajasthan. Registered under the Rajasthan Societies Registration Act, 1958 (Reg. No. 161/Jodhpur/2014-15, dated October 13, 2014), we began with small educational initiatives in Jodhpur district.
about.missionText: To uplift rural communities through holistic development approaches focusing on education, healthcare, and socio-economic empowerment.
about.visionText: A society where rural communities have equal access to quality education, healthcare, and opportunities for sustainable livelihoods.
